ComicInfo.Penciller: Alvaro Sarraseca,Fernando Heinz Furukawa,Kieran McKeown,Tomas Aira
ComicInfo.Summary:
Varric Tethras and Lace Harding have a tough job ahead of them. Tasked with finding their former friend Solas, the pair find themselves facing down a lot more than they bargained for. With a difference of opinion on how to approach their target, and new enemies around every corner, the duo might find they've bitten off more than they can chew.
Collects Dragon Age: The Missing 1-4.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-10 19:55:51. [CVDB1032869]
